name: JPMorgan Chase & Co.
goal: Please consult our website listed above for details of JPMC's goals and objectives.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
